name: Running From Time
description:
A simple game made for a jam in 3 days, the theme is: Playing With Time.

You managed to travel through time but broke the timeline! Now there is a time monster running after you, trying to kill you!

Try to survive as long as possible and return to your original timeline.

Each run of the game has a different number of levels or the same order- due to the portal being unstable and sending you to a different time!

Premade assets I used besides my own:

background- Unicorn A

monster-LuizMelo

Background music:

 Green Tea by Purrple Cat | https://purrplecat.com/
